Package algorithms.compGeometry

    Class Description

    NOT READY FOR USE.
    ClosestPairBetweenSets.ClosestPairInt  
    FurthestPair
    find the furthest pair between points by finding the upper and lower convex hull and then compare the distances between upper and lower hull points.
    HoughTransform
    a class for Hough transforms of simple geometric shapes.
    LinesAndAngles
    adapted from https://code.google.com/p/two-point-correlation/source/browse/src/main/java/algorithms/compGeometry/LinesAndAngles.java under MIT License (MIT), Nichole King 2013
    MedialAxis
    A class to create a 2D medial axis given shape points and the boundary.
    NearestPoints
    Builds an unmodifiable data structure to make finding member points within a distance of a location faster than O(N^2).
    NearestPointsFloat
    Builds an unmodifiable data structure to make finding member points within a distance of a location faster than O(N^2).
    ParabolaLeastSquares
    y = ax^2 + bx + c least squares fit is minimizing the sum of square of residuals summation from i=1 to n points of (y_i - (ax_i^2 + bx_i + c))^2 to minimize, need each partial deriv = 0, that is d(eqn)/da = 0, etc the 3 partial derivatives are summarized as a * sum_i=1toN (x_i)^4 + b * sum_i=1toN (x_i)^3 + c * sum_i=1toN (x_i)^2 = sum_i=1toN (x_i)^2 * y_i a * sum_i=1toN (x_i)^3 + b * sum_i=1toN (x_i)^2 + c * sum_i=1toN (x_i) = sum_i=1toN (x_i) * y_i a * sum_i=1toN (x_i)^2 + b * sum_i=1toN (x_i)^1 + c * n = sum_i=1toN y_i given a set of points, can calc moments x y x^2 x^3 x^4 xy yx^2 (when placed in a matrix, is known as Vandermonde) sum each of those for the points then can solve the 3 equations for a, b, c using linear algebra.
    PerimeterFinder2
    class to hold some of the newer methods w.r.t.
    PointInPolygon
    test whether a point is within a polygon.

    PointPartitioner
